title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 70.4 - Service of petition on commissioner of labor for answer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 70.4 - Service of petition on commissioner of labor for answer

State Regulations

Upon the filing of a petition as provided in this Part, the
board shall serve a copy thereof upon the Commissioner of Labor by transmittal
to the office of the commissioner's general counsel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
70.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
